page.title: 17BIRMINGHAM UNIVERSITY TODAY
page.content: The Campus occupies 231 acres of land. Most of the buildings have been built within the last 20 years. In the year 1983-4 there were{7116 full time{undergraduates, 1403}full time{post graduates}and{1357 academic {staff}attending the University. The University offers 100 courses under the main headings of {Science {and Engineering, Arts, Medicine, {Commerce and Social Science, Law and {General Education. Facilities offered by the University are a{Bookshop, Stationery shop, {Travel Agency, Barber's shop, Health {Centre, Church, Library and a Sports {Centre.}Sports available are squash, badminton, tennis, golf, fencing, judo, karate, aikido, volleyball, swimming, sub-aqua, canoeing, athletics, hockey, netball, rugby and soccer.
